abstract: investors buy ameriprise financial on weakness .
article: traders bought shares of ameriprise financial , inc. . on weakness during trading on monday . $ 25.26 million flowed into the stock on the tick-up and $ 12.17 million flowed out of the stock on the tick-down , for a money net flow of $ 13.09 million into the stock . of all equities tracked , ameriprise financial had the 32nd highest net in-flow for the day . ameriprise financial traded down for the day and closed at $ 171.51 several research analysts recently issued reports on amp shares . valuengine cut ameriprise financial from a `` strong-buy '' rating to a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , december 1st .

zacks investment research raised ameriprise financial from a `` hold '' rating to a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 155.00 price objective on the stock in a research note on friday , september 1st . barclays reissued an `` equal weight '' rating on shares of ameriprise financial in a research note on monday , october 2nd . royal bank of canada set a $ 168.00 price objective on ameriprise financial and gave the stock a `` hold '' rating in a research note on saturday , december 16th . finally , suntrust banks increased their price objective on ameriprise financial from $ 140.00 to $ 165.00 and gave the stock a `` hold '' rating in a research note on thursday , october 26th .

four analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and seven have assigned a buy rating to the company 's stock . the company currently has a consensus rating of `` buy '' and an average target price of $ 155.64 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.82 , a current ratio of 0.67 and a quick ratio of 0.67 . the company has a market capitalization of $ 25,370.00 , a price-to-earnings ratio of 16.01 and a beta of 1.92 . ameriprise financial last posted its earnings results on tuesday , october 24th . the financial services provider reported $ 3.12 earnings per share for the quarter , topping analysts ' consensus estimates of $ 2.79 by $ 0.33 .

the company had revenue of $ 3 billion during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 2.97 billion . ameriprise financial had a return on equity of 29.75 % and a net margin of 14.24 % . ameriprise financial 's revenue was up 6.3 % on a year-over-year basis . during the same quarter in the prior year , the business earned $ 2.29 earnings per share . equities research analysts predict that ameriprise financial , inc. . will post 12.14 earnings per share for the current year . in other news , insider joseph edward sweeney sold 7,329 shares of the stock in a transaction on friday , december 8th .

the stock was sold at an average price of $ 169.47 , for a total transaction of $ 1,242,045.63 . following the completion of the sale , the insider now owns 37,991 shares in the company , valued at approximately $ 6,438,334.77 . the sale was disclosed in a document filed with the sec , which is accessible through the sec website . also , insider john robert woerner sold 9,022 shares of the stock in a transaction on thursday , october 26th . the shares were sold at an average price of $ 160.91 , for a total value of $ 1,451,730.02 .

following the sale , the insider now owns 43,167 shares of the company 's stock , valued at approximately $ 6,946,001.97 . the disclosure for this sale can be found here . in the last 90 days , insiders have sold 67,649 shares of company stock valued at $ 10,882,637 . 1.50 % of the stock is owned by company insiders . several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of the company . atlantic trust group llc raised its stake in ameriprise financial by 0.4 % in the 3rd quarter . atlantic trust group llc now owns 137,280 shares of the financial services provider 's stock worth $ 20,388,000 after acquiring an additional 479 shares during the last quarter .

parametric portfolio associates llc raised its stake in ameriprise financial by 4.5 % in the 3rd quarter . parametric portfolio associates llc now owns 691,734 shares of the financial services provider 's stock worth $ 102,729,000 after acquiring an additional 29,610 shares during the last quarter . axa raised its stake in ameriprise financial by 27.0 % in the 3rd quarter . axa now owns 393,747 shares of the financial services provider 's stock worth $ 58,476,000 after acquiring an additional 83,673 shares during the last quarter . shelton capital management purchased a new position in ameriprise financial in the 3rd quarter worth $ 203,000 .

finally , steward partners investment advisory llc purchased a new position in ameriprise financial in the 3rd quarter worth $ 2,484,000 . hedge funds and other institutional investors own 81.51 % of the company 's stock . illegal activity notice : this piece was first posted by watch list news and is the sole property of of watch list news . if you are viewing this piece on another domain , it was illegally stolen and reposted in violation of us & international copyright legislation . the original version of this piece can be accessed at ameriprise financialameriprise financial , inc is a financial services company that offers financial solutions to individual and institutional clients .

the company operates in five segments : advice & wealth management ; asset management ; annuities ; protection , and corporate & other . the company uses ameriprise financial as its enterprise brand , as well as the name of its advisor network and certain of its retail products and services .
